metadata.title: CVE-2022-37703 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: In Amanda 3.5.1, an information leak vulnerability was found in thecalcsize SUID binary. An attacker can abuse this vulnerability to know if adirectory exists or not anywhere in the fs. The binary will use `opendir()`as root directly without checking the path, letting the attacker provide anarbitrary path.

criterions.comment: amanda: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
